seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience (4-5 relevant) with complex responsibilities including implementing predictive models, designing enterprise applications, and big data processing

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on technical implementation (predictive models, pipelines, data integration) with collaborative work but no mention of direct reports or management responsibilities

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure services
